scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=assay webpack serve --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/watch.config.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=assay webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/dev.config.js
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROD_SOURCE_MAP=source-map LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=platform LK_MODULE=assay webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/prod.config.js --progress --profile
scripts.clean: rimraf resources/web/assay/gen && rimraf resources/views/gen && rimraf resources/views/*.*
